Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that are followed by SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers in variants that eventually lead to SW-EIC Accept
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Number of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that are preceded by SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that occur in cases where SW-Reviewer Declined appears at least once
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers in the top 5 most frequent process variants
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that are not followed by any reviewer response (i.e., followed only by SW-Reviewer No Response or timeouts)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Ratio of SW-AE Assign Reviewers to SW-Reviewer Agreed across the entire event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of SW-AE Assign Reviewers per case, averaged over all cases containing this activity
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers compared to the frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that are repeated more than three times within the same case
Metric: the average of the function base > 3 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Fraction of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that directly precede a successful reviewer agreement (SW-Reviewer Agreed) without intermediate declines or unavailability events
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers occurring in cases that include at least one instance of Assign a Different Editor
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers out of all reviewer assignment-related activities (including RW-AE Assign Reviewers and RSW-AE Assign Reviewers)
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity in ['SW-AE Assign Reviewers', 'RW-AE Assign Reviewers', 'RSW-AE Assign Reviewers']"}"

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that occur after a reviewer reminder (Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 or Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2)
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity in ['Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1', 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2']"}"

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that appear in variants ending with a rejection (SW-EIC Reject, SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit)
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity in ['SW-EIC Reject', 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit']"}"
